EmailTemplate.description: Generic follow up email with link to schedule a call.
EmailTemplate.name: 10K Delivery - Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: 10K Expert Community - Follow Up Conversation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you again for expressing interest as an Expert with the 10K Community.
Based on your profile, I would like to schedule a call with you where we can talk about the 10K Community and I can learn more about your background and how we can help.
Please let me know a few times that will work for us to talk over the next 2 weeks, or you can visit and schedule a conversation here - calendly.com/jared-10k.
Thanks again and I look forward to speaking with you!
Jared
Jared Miller | Vice President, Service Delivery 813-957-1665 Jared@10kview.com
